videos.description: Jacob Groves launches a buzzer-beater from way out vs. the Mountaineers.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Jacob Groves hits a first-half buzzer-beater) 2022/01/27 ESHEET

videos.description: Jalen Bridges follows up a Malik Curry miss with a dunk for the Mountaineers.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Jalen Bridges hammers down a putback dunk for WVU) 2022/01/27 ESHEET
